text:
Defamation Order 2020

I make the following order under section 35(3) of the Defamation Act 2005 .

22 June 2020

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Justice

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Defamation Order 2020 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 July 2020.

3. Maximum damages amount
    For the purposes of section 35(1) of the Defamation Act 2005 , the maximum damages amount that is to apply from 1 July 2020 is declared to be $421 000.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 1 July 2020

This order is administered in the Department of Justice.
